thread.title: Punxsutawney Phil Groundhog Day Sees Shadow Six More Weeks Winter
thread.title_full: Punxsutawney Phil Groundhog Day Sees Shadow Six More Weeks Winter

author: Fox News Insider
title: Punxsutawney Phil Groundhog Day Sees Shadow Six More Weeks Winter
text:
TONIGHT on Fox News: Milo Yiannopoulos joins Tucker at 9pm ET, followed by VP Mike Pence on "Hannity" at 10pm ET. Punxsutawney Phil Sees His Shadow, Signaling 6 More Weeks of Winter! // Punxsutawney Phil 
The tradition of Groundhog Day continued Thursday for the 131st year. 
In front of one of the largest crowds in Gobbler's Knob history, famed groundhog Punxsutawney Phil saw his shadow, signaling six more weeks of winter. 
According to officials, the groundhog has predicted six more weeks of winter 103 times, compared to 18 times predicting an early spring. 
Watch the above video to see the furry forecaster in action. 
Do you think Phil got it right? Sound off in the comments section! Subscribe
